nodes.text: The zolall was a nocturnal predator from the planet Merisee. It was a hairless smooth-skinned creature with a long tail and triangular wings. Air sacs in the abdomen kept it aloft. It was a vicious predator that ensnared prey in its tail. Poison sacs under the zolall's tongue produced a venom that the Loag assassins used to coat their blades.
